extendedInfo.description: Packing List helps you to create and maintain packing lists. It not only lets user to create a list from scratch, but also allows you to generate lists from an existing one. This application comes with a pre-loaded packing master list. You can simply check the categories/ items for their trip, click on âGenerate Listâ menu item and you will have a packing list ready in no time. You can group items by category, location and luggage. Each items also has note, quantity and weight fields. Mass change feature allow you to edit lists more easily. You may also email and share your lists. Printing out a copy of the lists helps you in case of lost luggage. Key features include:	â¢ Pre-loaded master list	â¢ Create new list from scratch or generate from existing one	â¢ Support Multiple lists	â¢ Reorder categories/items using drag/drop	â¢ Mass change for easy editing	â¢ Group by location/luggage for easy packing	â¢ All the lists are saved on SD card	â¢ Email/Share lists	â¢ Shortcut to particular list from home screenThe full version(paid version) doesn't have ads and allows you to check weather. It also allow you to sync/share lists between devices and users when used along with Packing List Cloud Connector(separate purchase is required) Please check the help file for detailed information.***It will not be efficient if you only leave comment in Google Play when you have issues using this app. The best way to solve them is to contact us directly. It will not only help you, but also help other users. We answer every user's email within one business day. Please also feel free to try out our paid version. We always give full refund if you are not happy with our apps.***5/23/2011 v3.0.1Fix bug in "Add items to existing list"5/14/2011 V3.0.0 Release notes:* Add new home screen displaying lists' name along with their last modified date, the count of the packed items and percentage.* Add more settings to allow user to customize the background/text colors (full version only)* Allow user to edit items in Group by Location/Luggage mode* Add weight field to items. When group by luggage, the total weight will be calculated and displayed next to each luggage. User can choose to use "English Units" or "Metric" system in Settings.* Add more mass changes in full version. Now you can copy and move multiple items between categories or delete them.* Add mass change location/luggage in Group by Location/Luggage mode* Add "Search" functionality* Add sort by packed items* Other minor enhancement and bug fixes7/28/2011 V3.0.2* Fix "Force Close" bugs in starting and other places* Allow adding shortcuts for particular list to home screen* Other improvement and bug fixes9/19/2011 V3.0.3:* Add online packing list editor at www.dotnetideas.com* Fix minor bugs3/28/2012 V3.0.4:* Fix "Force Close" bug in group by luggage6/19/2012 V3.1.0-Add destination, departure/return date and notes to list and sort lists by departure date-Add "Mass Change" mode which allow user to check items separately for mass change. Doing mass change will not mess checked items for packing anymore-Lite version has full access to "Mass Change" nowFull version only:-Quick quantity editing-Allow user to check weather for destinations -List syncing and sharing (separate purchase of Packing List Cloud Connector is required)

reviews.title: This App Is Perfect!
reviews.comment: I love this app! Most packing list apps have tons of extra features, which is great and all, but I don\'t need those extra features. This app is super simple, but does what it needs to. I highly suggest this app if you\'re looking for a simple packing list app! If I could give a suggestion: It would be great if we could create a account, or even use our Google accounts, so we can access our lists on other devices. Keep up the great work!
reviews.author: Lindsey Whited

reviews.title: Nice app
reviews.comment: Works well for what it is but. I will pay for this app when i can add and sort my own luggage bags, uses metric measurements, and can hide show notes in lists.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: This is just great!
reviews.comment: My days of writing lists over & over from scratch are gone.  Great the free version works, and you can upgrade to more functionality for a few dollars.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Nice design web
reviews.comment: The interface wasn\'t too appealing,  but after gone through several apps, this one\'s design is the most usable one and will save me both time to use and to edit.  Features like uncheck all, generate new list from exiting, each list as a separate file are all nice to have
reviews.author: Lawrence Chan

reviews.title: Fantastic!
reviews.comment: I am so in love with this app! It has everything a packing list needs. I can sort by room or by luggage.I can create my own lists, categories and items. I can be as detailed as I want! This app is so easy to use and it does everything I want it to and then some, and it manages to give me all these great tools without over complicating things. Its truly awesome!! I wish I could find this app in the appstore so I could sync between my iphone and my Nook.
reviews.author: Shalina Grorich

reviews.title: Need small improvements to be Perfect
Lacking certain features for those of us trying to shave weight
reviews.comment: This is the best packing list app for android I\'ve come across but it\'s lacking certain features that would make it truly useful to me:  1. Calculate and display total weights next to categories and have this value be dynamically updated as items are checked/unchecked. Being able to see weights of categories allows a more detailed understanding of where the weight is distributed. The current implementation only shows total weights when sorting by luggage and even then it doesn\'t dynamically update. This makes it useless, especially since I only carry one bag.  2. Subitems. Sometimes I want to breakdown certain items even further. e.g. Health category -> First aid kit item -> Contents of first aid kit subitems. Adding that one level would make a huge difference.  As it is, this app is so close to being what I need but not quite there yet. Add these features and you\'ve got yourself a customer.
reviews.author: Steven Bach

reviews.title: Awesome!
reviews.comment: Everything I need, plus all lists store on SD, and can share list via any number of ways.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: upgrade wiped out old lists????????????
reviews.comment: Happy user for quite some time.  However, the most recent upgrade erase highly cultivated lists from the previous version.  Very unhappy.
reviews.author: Guy Danner

reviews.title: Cool but...
reviews.comment: Add ability to copy list and items to another title. I use a lot of the same things for different trips I should be able to copy them and modify each one
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Changing my review!
reviews.comment: Just found the button I was looking for. This is awesome! Loving it :)
reviews.author: Teleah Milesi

reviews.title: Lost it all
reviews.comment: this app is great unless you change phones. I had a great packing list going, then I changed phones and lost all of it. I will use Google Tasks from now on to use my packing list for since it is always updated and saved.
reviews.author: April Lynne

reviews.title: Victor & Marie
reviews.comment: Copying multiple items from one list to another is under \"Mass Change\".
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Pretty Sweeet!
reviews.comment: Easy to use, very helpfull, very fulfilling when your list is complete!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: OK
reviews.comment: Cannot get this app to work
reviews.author: Ann Pennington

reviews.title: Working great! (now that buutons clear)
reviews.comment: Just took awhile to see all features... Not all visible on screen, must click on bottom of screen to accesss new list and help
reviews.author: A Google User
